mapper.select: select * from t_brand where status=true and brand_name=#{brandName}
select bd.brand_id, bd.brand_name, bd.remark, bd.source, DATE_FORMAT(bd.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') create_time from t_brand bd where 1=1 and bd.`status`=true and bd.brand_id=#{brandId}

select bd.brand_id, bd.brand_name, bd.remark, bd.source, DATE_FORMAT(bd.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') create_time from t_brand bd where bd.`status`=true
and (bd.brand_id like CONCAT('%',#{brand},'%') or bd.brand_name like CONCAT('%',#{brand},'%'))
and bd.source=#{source}
and DATE_FORMAT(bd.create_time,'%Y%m%d')>=DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y%m%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(bd.create_time,'%Y%m%d')<=DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y%m%d')
and bd.remark like CONCAT('%',#{remark},'%')
order by bd.brand_id desc
